price: Basi tukamwokoa yeye na ahali zake wote,.
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akamuitikia ombi lake, akamwokoa yeye na wale walio fuata wito wake, kwa kuwatoa wote majumbani mwao wakati wa kuteremka adhabu kuwashukia wenye kukanusha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
